description: Manning`s Heatmor participated in the Pok√©mon World Tournament Junior Cup at the Kagome Town stadium. In the first round it was in the second match and faced off against Kenton`s Golett. The match quickly showcased Manning`s Heatmor finishing off Kenton`s Golett with Flamethrower to win the battle which allowed Manning to advance to the second round while Kenton was eliminated from the tournament.
name: Kuitaran (Marufuji)
